{"max_page_size":200,"page_size":5,"num_pages":21,"page_number":1,"count":105,"next":2,"previous":null,"results":[{"id":327992,"__entity_role__":null,"__entity_type__":"org_evidence","__permissions__":["org_evidence:delete","org_evidence:create_subtask","org_evidence:master_evidence_diff","org_evidence:view_details","org_evidence:comment","org_evidence:observation","org_evidence:remind","org_evidence:upgrade","org_evidence:add","org_evidence:deadline","org_evidence:mark_reviewed","org_evidence:mark_sensitive","org_evidence:create_jira_issue","org_evidence:manage_tags","org_evidence:edit","org_evidence:manage_acl","org_evidence:assign"],"created":"2021-12-17T14:42:01.070790Z","name":"Access Control / Registration and De-registration Process Document","description":"Provide user registration and de-registration process document/Access Control policy or procedure reviewed by management.","guidance":"","ad_hoc":false,"last_collected":"2024-04-03","collection_interval":"year","due_days_before_end":0,"master_version_num":5,"sensitive":false,"org_id":12345,"completed":true,"master_evidence_id":550},{"id":327993,"__entity_role__":null,"__entity_type__":"org_evidence","__permissions__":["org_evidence:delete","org_evidence:create_subtask","org_evidence:master_evidence_diff","org_evidence:view_details","org_evidence:comment","org_evidence:observation","org_evidence:remind","org_evidence:upgrade","org_evidence:add","org_evidence:deadline","org_evidence:mark_reviewed","org_evidence:mark_sensitive","org_evidence:create_jira_issue","org_evidence:manage_tags","org_evidence:edit","org_evidence:manage_acl","org_evidence:assign"],"created":"2021-12-17T14:42:01.080707Z","name":"Population 2 - List of Employees and Contractors","description":"i) Provide a system-generated list of employees and contractors throughout the audit period including their start dates, title, and termination date (as applicable).
ii) Demonstrate the completeness of the population by providing evidence of query and or date range entered to generate the population.","guidance":"","ad_hoc":false,"last_collected":"2025-07-01","collection_interval":"year","due_days_before_end":0,"master_version_num":2,"sensitive":false,"org_id":12345,"completed":true,"master_evidence_id":536},{"id":327994,"__entity_role__":null,"__entity_type__":"org_evidence","__permissions__":["org_evidence:delete","org_evidence:create_subtask","org_evidence:master_evidence_diff","org_evidence:view_details","org_evidence:comment","org_evidence:observation","org_evidence:remind","org_evidence:upgrade","org_evidence:add","org_evidence:deadline","org_evidence:mark_reviewed","org_evidence:mark_sensitive","org_evidence:create_jira_issue","org_evidence:manage_tags","org_evidence:edit","org_evidence:manage_acl","org_evidence:assign"],"created":"2021-12-17T14:42:01.089012Z","name":"User Access Approval List to Application, Infrastructure and Service","description":"For a sample of users, including privileged, selected, provide evidence of documented approval for their remote and logical access to the in-scope application and supporting infrastructure. (Samples to be provided by the auditor)","guidance":"","ad_hoc":false,"last_collected":"2025-07-01","collection_interval":"quarter","due_days_before_end":0,"master_version_num":10,"sensitive":false,"org_id":12345,"completed":true,"master_evidence_id":4},{"id":327995,"__entity_role__":null,"__entity_type__":"org_evidence","__permissions__":["org_evidence:delete","org_evidence:create_subtask","org_evidence:master_evidence_diff","org_evidence:view_details","org_evidence:comment","org_evidence:observation","org_evidence:remind","org_evidence:upgrade","org_evidence:add","org_evidence:deadline","org_evidence:mark_reviewed","org_evidence:mark_sensitive","org_evidence:create_jira_issue","org_evidence:manage_tags","org_evidence:edit","org_evidence:manage_acl","org_evidence:assign"],"created":"2021-12-17T14:42:01.096772Z","name":"Population 15 - List of Users with Access to Application and Infrastructure","description":"Provide the system-generated list of users with access to the application and infrastructure throughout the audit period.","guidance":"","ad_hoc":false,"last_collected":"2025-06-30","collection_interval":"year","due_days_before_end":0,"master_version_num":4,"sensitive":false,"org_id":12345,"completed":true,"master_evidence_id":102},{"id":327996,"__entity_role__":null,"__entity_type__":"org_evidence","__permissions__":["org_evidence:delete","org_evidence:create_subtask","org_evidence:master_evidence_diff","org_evidence:view_details","org_evidence:comment","org_evidence:observation","org_evidence:remind","org_evidence:upgrade","org_evidence:add","org_evidence:deadline","org_evidence:mark_reviewed","org_evidence:mark_sensitive","org_evidence:create_jira_issue","org_evidence:manage_tags","org_evidence:edit","org_evidence:manage_acl","org_evidence:assign"],"created":"2021-12-17T14:42:01.128944Z","name":"Configuration for Application Password","description":"Provide screenshot(s) of password configuration for all in-scope applications that show at least:
i) The min/max length.
ii) The defined password complexity.
iii) The password change frequency (e.g. every 90 days).
iv) Account lock-out threshold (e.g. six failed attempts).
v) Account lock-out duration (e.g. 30 minutes or until an administrator enables the user id).
vi) The number of generations during which a password cannot be re-used.
vii) That an immediate change to a permanent password is required when a temporary password is used.","guidance":"","ad_hoc":false,"last_collected":null,"collection_interval":"year","due_days_before_end":0,"master_version_num":5,"sensitive":false,"org_id":12345,"completed":false,"master_evidence_id":10}]}
